txt.en: At Lúfa's behest, you brought Thane Ordlac's token to Thane Torferth at Torsbury. He received it with great wrath.
Talk to Torferth to march upon Stoke
Thane Torferth is in the Mead Hall of Stoke.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Torferth regarding Ordlac and his treachery.
'I am proud to fight alongside you once more...Forth the Toringas!'

'I am grateful for your aid, [placeholder]. If you had not accompanied me, I fear that Reeve Fríthbert and his sister would have perished at Ordlac's hand. This is a terrible time, however, for Fríthbert is not yet old enough to lead the people of the Broadacres....'
Thane Torferth is at Tordag's encampment near Torsbury.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Torferth when you are ready to march upon Stoke.
Stoke has been freed and Reeve Fríthild's children saved from Ordlac

'We must ride at once, [placeholder], for there is little time to lose. The lives of many are at stake, not the least of which are Lúfa's and the Reeve's children's. We must take Stoke from the traitor and bring him ruin!\n\n'There is no time to spare, my friend...will you ride with the Toringas once more?'
